channel.title: Help for making adminzone
channel.description: Ok im making adminzone so i have the command to get there its in cammy party room so i wanted to add white party hat to sapwn on table and other ones so in autospawn i add spawn= 1048 then i had zeros under height and range and i put cords in and i put adminzone at the end but when i save and compile it doesnt let people log in server and it says your account is already logged in =[ help plz

item.title: Help for making adminzone
item.dc:creator: @gman035t gman035t
item.description:
@gman035t wrote:

sigh I really don’t know java from a hole in the wall.

Could you please help me?

Yes I kinda figured that was one of the problems. What am I supposed to do to start that if statement off. A public void of some sort maybe?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2007, 07:03:32 PM[/size][hr]Also, those coords are the coords of a box around varrock castle.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2007, 07:22:39 PM[/size][hr]So what is my problem?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2007, 08:14:25 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Help for making adminzone
item.dc:creator: @gman035t gman035t
item.description:
@gman035t wrote:

Yeah it did, and what s c a r put fixed it. But there are more errors.

(Identifier) Expected
if (isinadminzone == true && playerrights) = 2
or something like that.

Can someone help?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2007, 05:38:18 PM[/size][hr]I also get an illegal start of an expression. Here is what I got.

//Admin Zone

public boolean IsInAdminZone(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if (coordY >= 3457 && coordY <= 3457 && coordX <= 3199 && coordX >= 3199) {
return true;
}
return false;
}

if(IsInAdminZone == true && playerRights >= 2) {
sendMessage(“Welcome “+playerName+” to the admin zone!”);
} else {
teleportToX = 3212;
teleportToY = 3437;
sendMessage(“You tried going into an admin zone, and you are NOT an admin”);
}

What is wrong with it?

Read full topic

item.title: Help for making adminzone
item.dc:creator: @S_C_A_R_Bot S C A R Bot
item.description:
@S_C_A_R_Bot wrote:

“+playerName+”);

Might would give an error for unclosed string but then try

“+playerName+” ");

item.title: Help for making adminzone
item.dc:creator: @S_C_A_R_Bot S C A R Bot
item.description:
@S_C_A_R_Bot wrote:

public boolean IsInAdminZone(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (coordY >= [b]YCOORD[/b] && coordY <= [b]YCOORD[/b] && coordX <= [b]XCOORD[/b] && coordX >= [b]XCOORD[/b]) { return true; } return false; }

Change bolt to coords from party room just like safezones (I AM NOT GOING TO EXPLAIN THAT)

add in public boolean process

if(IsInAdminZone == true && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Welcome "+playerName+"); } else { teleportToX = ####;//Change coords best to put it front outside the door teleportToY = ####;//Change coords best to put it front outside the door sendMessage("You are NOT an admin"); }

Read full topic
